info.description: Platform where users can manage and join programming projects
info.title: Build Me

tags.name: Answers
tags.description: Manage the available answers for each question

tags.name: Learners
tags.description: Allow users to associate with a vacancy as learners, individuals who will learn about the technologies required for the vacancy with the help of the selected candidate

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: Manage programming projects where the users can colaborate by joining on related vacancies

tags.name: Questions
tags.description: Manage the questions that can be associated with answers and used to create tests for evaluating the user’s skills

tags.name: Rankings
tags.description: Displays user information sorted into rankings based on various parameters, such as: the highest number of reviews received, the highest number of project participations, and more

tags.name: Ratings
tags.description: Manage the ratings that were created to assess the performance of colleagues in a project

tags.name: Technologies
tags.description: Administer the technologies that can be designated as requirements for projects' vacancies and user skills

tags.name: Tests
tags.description: Management of tests that evaluate the skill level of a user in a certain technology

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Manage the users that can use the platform

tags.name: User skills
tags.description: Displays user skills in the technologies registered on the platform

tags.name: Vacancies
tags.description: Manages the available positions in the projects where users can apply and start actively participating in the project

tags.name: Vacancy requirements
tags.description: Manages the requirements that a user should meet to candidate to a project's vacancy

tags.name: Vacancy subscriptions
tags.description: Allow the user to candidate to project vacancies for which they meet the requirements

tags.name: Votations
tags.description: Allow a project owner to manage votations that ban users related to the project's vacancies

tags.name: Votes
tags.description: Manage votes in a votation to ban a user from a vacancy

post.description: Create answers for questions that users can select during tests

409.description: The user already created a learner record related to the same vacancy

example.message: This user was already registered as a learner for this vacancy

User reached learner association limit.description: The user has registered three times as a learner for different vacancies from open projects and is attempting to become a learner for another vacancy

value.message: The user has already reached the limit of 3 subscriptions as a learner

Vacancy reached learner association limi.description: Each vacancy has a limit of learners that can be related and this one have reached its limit

value.message: It's not possible to add a new learner, the limit of 5 learners related to this vacancy was already reached
